oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Elihu H. Steen copyprint
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy of crayon print image of Pvt. Elihu H. Steen. Steen was born on May 3, 1845. He enlisted in Co. H, 2nd Tenn. (Robinson's) Inf. Regt., CSA, on April 25, 1862, in Hartsville, Tennessee. According to his Confederate service record, he deserted on Feb. 16, 1864. Steen took the Oath of Allegiance in Camp Chase, Ohio. He then enlisted in Co. A, 26th Ky. Inf. Regt., USA, and served out the war in the Union Army. He died on October 27, 1909, and is buried in the Nelson McDonald Cemetery in Lafayette, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Steen, Elihu H.
